ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader simulates CMYK Halftone patterns.
Input:
- Front: source clip
Setup:
- Minimum : minimum pattern - Maximum : maximum pattern - Gain : brightness of the pattern - Scale: scale pattern
Demo clip: http://vimeo.com/82144555
Shader developer: tsone
Based on https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Mdf3Dn
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.
Matchbox version by ivar@inferno-op.com
ShaderNodePreset.Name: crok cmyk halftone
